scripts.static-re-dev: cp -fR packages/core packages/real-estate && mv -f packages/real-estate/package.json packages/real-estate/_package.json && cp -f packages/core/Dockerfile packages/real-estate/Dockerfile && cp -f packages/core/package.json packages/real-estate/package.json && cd packages/real-estate && now --build-env ENV_FILE=dev --static --force && rm -f package.json && mv -f _package.json package.json && rm -fR core && rm -f Dockerfile
scripts.static-re-production: cp -fR packages/core packages/real-estate && mv -f packages/real-estate/package.json packages/real-estate/_package.json && cp -f packages/core/Dockerfile packages/real-estate/Dockerfile && cp -f packages/core/package.json packages/real-estate/package.json && cd packages/real-estate && now --build-env ENV_FILE=production --static --force && rm -f package.json && mv -f _package.json package.json && rm -fR core && rm -f Dockerfile
scripts.static-re-local: cd packages/real-estate && NODE_ENV=production LOCAL=true yarn generate
